name: web_scraper
description: This is a sample plugin that can scrape a given URL or a given HTML string.

module.name: Scrape URL/HTML
module.description: A simple module that will take either a URL or HTML string and scrape it for user specific elements.

param.description: Enter either a URL (starting with http:// or https://) or a HTML string for data to be extracted from.
A map of selectors where the key is the return property and the value is a jQuery selector of the element you wish to extract data from.
